description:
A deep bucket hat to protect little explorers on the trail. At UPF 50+, this hat helps keep little noggins sun safe.

  • Recycled polyester dries quickly and wicks away moisture
  • Reversible design gives them the option to flip between solid and print
  • Breakaway chinstrap keeps the hat right where it should be when the wind kicks up
  • UPF 50+ stops more than 98% of harsh UV in its tracks
name: Headster Panama Bucket Hat - Children
